details.description: Contact Companies House to register your limited company, file returns and accounts
details.body:
All limited companies in the UK, and overseas companies with a branch or place of business in the UK need to be registered with Companies House.

With Companies House you can:

  • register your company
  • file an annual return
  • file your company accounts
  • tell them about changes to your company, eg directors joining or leaving
  • close a company
  • find information about a company

Companies House

enquiries@companies-house.gov.uk
Telephone: 0303 1234 500
Minicom/textphone: 029 2038 1245
Monday to Friday 8.30am to 6pm

You can also write to the following address:

Companies House
Crown Way
Cardiff
CF14 3UZ

Includes registering, setting up, company accounts and tax returns
